decisions: Used CSS clamp() for fluid typography instead of fixed breakpoint sizes - provides smoother scaling

Created BasePanel parent class with comprehensive lifecycle, state, and event management

sessionHistory.notes: Integration: Replaced video panel with timer, fixed CSS (.timer-widget flex), querySelector null errors, variable hoisting. Touch improvements: 44-50px buttons, 2px borders, larger fonts, touch-action manipulation, scrollbar styling. BLOCKER: Pause/stop buttons render but don't trigger click events. sessionHistory.description: INFRASTRUCTURE: Fixed Pi-hole v6 API authentication in system-monitor.js backend. Modal close button bug fixed.
sessionHistory.notes: Debugged and fixed Pi-hole v6 API authentication failure. Root cause: Pi-hole v6 requires X-FTL-SID (session ID) and X-FTL-CSRF (CSRF token) headers in addition to session cookie. Updated authentication flow to extract both sid and csrf from login response, send proper headers with API requests. Fixed response parsing for v6's new structure (queries.total instead of stats.summary.total_queries). Added fallback_iframe URL (http://100.90.104.35/admin) to all error responses for future frontend integration. Authentication now working: 39,260 queries, 74.8% blocked. Also fixed modal close button (X) not working - issue was event listener attached before DOM element existed. System infrastructure now fully operational. NO PROPOSAL1 TASKS - this was system maintenance/debugging.

sessionHistory.description: PHASE 4 COMPLETE: Built comprehensive settings page with tabbed UI, theme selector, panel configuration, and backend API integration
sessionHistory.notes: Created full-featured settings page with 4 tabs (Theme, Panels, Display, About). Theme tab has visual preview cards for all 3 themes with live switching. Panel tab has toggle switches for 8 panels AND enhanced grid-based layout editor (superior to original drag-and-drop proposal). Display tab has CRT effects, animations, font size, and refresh interval settings. About tab shows system info. Added SettingsManager class with localStorage integration, unsaved changes warning, modal dialogs. Backend API: GET/POST /config/panels for loading/saving, POST /config/panels/reset for defaults. Added settings gear icon to dashboard header with rotating hover effect. 700+ lines of cyberpunk-themed CSS for settings page. Grid layout editor allows custom dimensions (1-4 rows/cols), tap-to-place panels, drag-to-move, resize controls, and proportional scaling. Phase 4 complete: 7/7 tasks. Ready for Phase 5 (Install & Migration).

sessionHistory.description: Grid layout system fixes: proportional sizing, panel visibility logic, content display
sessionHistory.notes: Fixed grid layout system to accurately represent kiosk display. Changed grid preview from fixed heights to proportional 16:9 aspect ratio. Updated grid-layout-manager to use flex:1 instead of hardcoded viewport calculations. Fixed panel visibility logic - panels in grid layout are now shown regardless of enabled flags. Added panelsEnabled sync to settings save. Fixed panel display mode from block to flex to maintain content sizing (resolved Cyberspace iframe height issue). Updated settings descriptions for clarity. Committed and pushed to GitHub main. Enhanced grid editor implementation exceeds original p4-t4 drag-and-drop proposal.

sessionHistory.description: P4.2 PARTIALLY COMPLETE: Calendar system implemented with bugs to fix
sessionHistory.notes: Implemented comprehensive calendar system with dual modes (modal + homescreen widget). MODAL MODE: Click date in header opens full calendar with month view navigation, event creation/deletion, 5 event types (reminder/meeting/task/birthday/other), upcoming events list. WIDGET MODE: Compact calendar for homescreen with mini month view, navigation, today button, event indicators, 3 upcoming events. Added 630+ lines of CSS (440 modal + 190 widget). FIXES APPLIED: Fixed modal scrolling (removed overflow constraints), added calendar to settings.html panel list, added calendar container to index.html (grid-panel-6), added calendar mappings to grid-layout-manager.js. BUGS DISCOVERED: Widget shows blank space on homescreen despite container existing - may be rendering issue, initialization timing problem, or CSS conflict. Modal click works correctly. User reported blank widget after enabling in settings and adding to grid layout. STATUS: Core implementation complete but needs debugging before marking task complete. NEXT SESSION MUST: Debug widget rendering, add console logging to CalendarPanel.renderContainer(), verify container.innerHTML is being set, check CSS display properties, test event sync between modes.

sessionHistory.description: P4.2 COMPLETE: Redesigned calendar widget to day view with navigation
sessionHistory.notes: Changed calendar widget from month view to day view based on user feedback. NEW DESIGN: Widget shows current day's events with left/right arrow buttons to navigate between days, large date display showing weekday/day number/month/year, 'TODAY' badge when viewing current day, event list with times/icons/descriptions sorted by time, 'JUMP TO TODAY' button when viewing other days. Clicking widget header still opens full modal calendar. TECHNICAL CHANGES: Replaced renderCompactMonth() and renderUpcomingMini() with new renderDayView() method, updated event handlers for prev-day/next-day navigation, completely rewrote calendar widget CSS (~200 lines) with day-specific classes (.calendar-day-header, .calendar-day-nav, .calendar-day-date, .calendar-day-events, etc.). Grid layout already properly configured (1 col × 2 rows). Design follows cyberpunk theme with cyan borders, neon glows, large typography. Touch-friendly with 40-44px button heights. Phase 4.2 now COMPLETE. Ready for testing on Pi 7-inch screen.

sessionHistory.description: VIDEO PANEL ENHANCEMENT: Complete implementation of video panel with modal player
sessionHistory.notes: ENHANCEMENT (not in original proposal): Implemented full video panel system using BasePanel architecture. FEATURES: YouTube video thumbnail rotation (30s intervals), click thumbnail/header to open modal, modal with embedded YouTube player (autoplay), video selector list with thumbnails, ESC key support, pause rotation while modal open. IMPLEMENTATION: Created VideoPanel class (380 lines) extending BasePanel with showModal/hideModal, video rotation, event delegation. Added HTML container (grid-panel-7, data-panel-id='video'). Added initVideoPanel() function in app.js. Added comprehensive CSS (245+ lines) for modal overlay, video embed (16:9 responsive iframe), video selector list, thumbnail view with play icon overlay, hover effects. BUGS FIXED: Initial 'Cannot read properties of undefined (reading autoplay)' error - changed this.config to this.settings (BasePanel uses settings not config). Missing CSS for modal - added complete video-modal-* classes. Video panel now fully functional with rotating thumbnails and modal playback. Grid layout configured at row 2, col 0, 1x2 size. Panel marked as visible in panels.json. Successfully tested on Pi 7-inch screen via browser.

sessionHistory.description: SYSTEM MONITOR PANEL ENHANCEMENT: Complete implementation following video panel pattern
sessionHistory.notes: ENHANCEMENT (not in original proposal): Implemented system monitor panel following video panel architecture. DUAL MODE IMPLEMENTATION: Widget view shows CPU temp (large), CPU/Memory/Disk usage in grid with color-coded values (green<60%, amber 60-80%, red>80%). Modal view shows detailed stats: large CPU temp, 2x2 grid (CPU usage, GPU temp, Memory, Disk with percentages and absolute values), system info (uptime, load averages, status), refresh button. INTEGRATION: Created SystemPanel class (571 lines) extending BasePanel. Auto-refresh every 15s. Click widget or header temperature to open modal. ESC key support. Fetches from /stats endpoint. HTML container (grid-panel-8, data-panel-id='system'). initSystemPanel() in app.js. Updated temperature click handler to use system panel modal (fallback to old modal if not initialized). CSS: Added 350+ lines for widget/modal styling. Added grid-panel-8 to responsive.css grid areas. Added .grid-panel-8:hover to cyberpunk.css for panel zoom effect (other themes need same update). Added .system-widget-compact:hover for inner content zoom. System panel fully functional with both widget and modal modes. Panel registry already included system panel definition. Grid layout mappings already configured. Ready for testing on Pi screen.
